transcripts.text: So I'm going to just shut up about it and bring out Dr.  Sonia Sanchez.

She just sat and stared, wouldn't watch the TV When I turned it on, when we got home She just stared at me with her eyes Dog-like, just sat and looked at me with her eyes Till I had to get out of there, you know My baby ran away from home last week.
